Configuration.Name: container_config/memory_limit
Configuration.Description: Limits the container's memory usage. Use a positive integer value followed by one of these units [b,k,m,g] (byte, kibibyte, mebibyte, gibibyte).

Configuration.Name: container_config/memory_request
Configuration.Description: Requests the container's minimal memory requirement. Use a positive integer value followed by one of these units [b,k,m,g] (byte, kibibyte, mebibyte, gibibyte).

Configuration.Name: container_config/swap_limit
Configuration.Description: Limits the container's swap memory usage. Use zero or a positive integer value followed by one of these units [b,k,m,g] (byte, kibibyte, mebibyte, gibibyte). 0 will disable swapping.

Configuration.Name: container_config/cpu_core_limit
Configuration.Description: Limits the container's CPU core usage. Use a positive floating value describing a fraction of 1 CPU core. When you define a value of '0.5', you are requesting half as much CPU time compared to if you asked for '1.0' CPU.

Configuration.Name: container_config/cpu_core_request
Configuration.Description: Requests the container's minimal CPU core requirement. Use a positive floating value describing a fraction of 1 CPU core. When you define a value of '0.5', you are requesting half as much CPU time compared to if you asked for '1.0' CPU.

Configuration.Name: container_config/storage_limit
Configuration.Description: Limits the container's ephemeral storage usage. Use a positive integer value followed by one of these units [b,k,m,g] (byte, kibibyte, mebibyte, gibibyte).

Configuration.Name: container_config/storage_request
Configuration.Description: Requests the container's minimal ephemeral storage requirement. Use a positive integer value followed by one of these units [b,k,m,g] (byte, kibibyte, mebibyte, gibibyte).

Configuration.Name: logging/root
Configuration.Description: Set the root log level to one of ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG.
